content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (52.0, -82.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -82.0) with a furnace source of iron ore and a furnace result of iron plates.

### Furnace at position (52.0, -84.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -84.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnace
- Ensure the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.

### Errors when inserting items into furnace
- Make sure you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Move to the nearest resource before attempting to harvest it.
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource before attempting to harvest it.

### Errors when using insert_item or harvest_resource API
- Check your inventory and surroundings before calling these APIs to avoid errors.
